name: Fruitnight
description:
CONTROLS:

Space: fast forward dialogue

Esc: pause menu

After having left the grocery bag, a young fruit finds themselves in a culinary kitchen that’s full of utensils, appliances, and even other fruits! Said fruits have a culture within this kitchen: Of all the fruits, only the best pair of fruits goes in the blender once per two week. It’s better than simply growing too ripe and rotting in the kitchen after all. 

After asking around for a while, however, the newcomer begins to realize that the way to find this “best fruit pairing” is through testing your might and skills against other pairs. As a result, not only does the newcomer need to find another fruit to pair up with, but they also need to train up to best all the other pairs in the upcoming tournament
